_sText:
This map is very small. There is only one cell in which the terrorists spawn all together. There is a large pool, which is very deep. in the armory are weapons. However, there is no great choice! in the pool is a small shaft leading to the armory. so you have a good overview of the cell, there are around a small gang of the ct's. of course there is a healing chamber in which to heal itself. a small secret room is also available.
(you have to duck through a small crate next to the vending machines)

much fun playing with!



your mapper: dackelmausente1995

schullerd@hotmail.de
